name: log-hunter
description: Webpack loader that warns and/or removes forgotten console.log statments
author: Ryan Norman <rsnorman15@gmail.com> (http://github.com/rsnorman)

scripts.test-cov: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha -- --require test/support/env --reporter dot --check-leaks test/
scripts.test-travis: istanbul cover node_modules/mocha/bin/_mocha --report lcovonly -- --require test/support/env --reporter spec --check-leaks test/
